item.description: Projects Useful finds cicerone Create guided tours of Shiny applications using driver.js. reactable Interactive data tables for R, based on the React Table library and made with reactR. cicerone Currently reading x <- 8 y <- 10 x + y ## [1] 18 Noteworthy
